  • Method Details

    • register

      float register(Student student, String coursesID) throws CourseAlreadyOptedException, CourseNotAvailableException, CourseNotFoundException
      Registers a student for a course.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student registering for the course.
      coursesID - The ID of the course to be registered for.
      Returns:
      The total cost for the registered course.
      Throws:
      CourseAlreadyOptedException - If the student has already opted for the course.
      CourseNotAvailableException - If the course is not available.
      CourseNotFoundException - If the course with the specified ID is not found.

    • viewCoursesEnrolled

      List<Course> viewCoursesEnrolled(Student student)
      Retrieves the list of courses a student is currently enrolled in.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student whose courses are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `List` containing the courses the student is currently enrolled in.

    • viewCourses

      Set<Course> viewCourses()
      Retrieves the list of all available courses.
      Returns:
      A `Set` containing all the available courses.

    • getReport

      ReportCard getReport(Student student)
      Retrieves the report card for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student whose report card is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `ReportCard` object containing the student's academic report.

    • getBillingInfo

      Billing getBillingInfo(Student student) throws BillingNotFoundException
      Retrieves billing information for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student whose billing information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `Billing` object containing the billing information.
      Throws:
      BillingNotFoundException - If the billing information for the student is not found.

    • updateBillingInfo

      boolean updateBillingInfo(Billing billing)
      Updates the billing information for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      billing - The `Billing` object containing the updated billing information.
      Returns:
      `true` if the billing information was successfully updated; `false` otherwise.
